# [Interview #462: TGS Signing Report - Old (Peter) Salt, Entry #20](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=462#20)

#### Question

Was Mat’s blank dice bit taken from Guys and Dolls?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I’ve never seen Guys and Dolls.
